Egerkingen railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Egerkingen, in the Swiss canton of Solothurn. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Jura Foot line of Swiss Federal Railways.
Services
the following services stop at Egerkingen:
* : half-hourly service between  and , with trains continuing from Solothurn to , ,  or .
